text: @NEJM Hey @NEJM @GileadSciences.  How can you publish two articles and an editorial on remdesivir for #COVID19  and not even mention viral titers?  Is it possible there is no effect of viral load hence no MOA?  We deserve to know the data on the MOA or lack thereof.  $GILD
